answerText: Miguel de Cervantes [10] Cervantes is best known for this book whose title character rides a horse named Rocinante in search of his love Dulcinea.
heading: ACF Fall |2008 | Brown | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  He wrote about his experience as a hostage in Algiers in The Captive's Tale, which is among his Exemplary Novels. For 10 points each: [10]  Name this Spanish author whose work includes Journey to Parnassus, The Siege of Numantia, the romance Persiles and Sigismuinda, and a novel that depicts a man aided by Sancho Panza.
